name: Brookfield Business Corporation Class A Exchangeable Subordinate Voting Shares
longDescription: Brookfield Business Corp is a company established as a vehicle that owns and operates certain services and industrial operations on a global basis and an alternative vehicle for investors who prefer investing in its operations through a corporate structure. Its goal is to generate returns primarily through long-term capital appreciation with a modest distribution yield.
fulldescription: Brookfield Business Corp is a company established as a vehicle that owns and operates certain services and industrial operations on a global basis and an alternative vehicle for investors who prefer investing in its operations through a corporate structure. Its goal is to generate returns primarily through long-term capital appreciation with a modest distribution yield.
fullAddress: 1055 West Georgia Street,Suite 1500, P.O. Box 11117, Vancouver, BC, CA
